Replies.Author: Gene

Anyway, Steve was complaining about the fact that there are in fact 4 laws of robotics if you include the 0â€²th law: A robot may not harm humanity, or, by inaction, allow humanity to come to harm. Anyway, that was part 1 of the rage.

Personally, I found it frustrating how distrustful everyone was of robots, even up until the end. But hey, it all gets resolved in the end anyway.

Also, hi Grant! Howâ€™s vacation?

Replies.Content:

Anyway, hey, Gene! Vacationâ€™s nice. Twenty-six days until AX. Is your field session over?
